Day_1_pt_1_1: ^My consciousness rising from the darkness yet again.
^How long has it been since I last woke from my slumber...?
^in this meaningless darkness, I cannot feel or see a single thing
^Yet, I can sense someone calling out for me...
^Who are you? And what do yo-
^As if, someone, somewhere had just switched on the lights.
^Rather, it felt more like as if I had suddenly gained awareness of the concept of light, and the ability to perceive it.
^This smell.... anyone would recognize this smell.
^The sweet aroma of freshly ground coffee, slightly burnt, but nevertheless fruity.
^It is probably a medium roast Abrica from Ethiopia.
^I am not a morning person, but this smell..... makes me wanna get a cup of Latte.
^In fact, I'd do anything for a cup of Latte right now. Like a moth to a flame.
^I see. I must have fallen asleep in front of my computer or something...
^Eh? There isn't a computer in front of me.
^No, no, no, no, no... impossible... wait... wait...
^That sounded like it came directly from inside my head.
^Hahaha.... it can't be right. I must have been wearing a earpiece. That's right! An IEM!
^Before me stood a brown haired young girl wearing an apron of sorts with her eyes wide open, staring straight into my eyes.
^She seems to be in a state of shock.
^In her hands, held a food tray of sorts, raised high above her head as if... as if....
^A voice coming from somewhere else spoked in a panicked voice.
^The sounds of something metallic getting knocked over.

c-0: ^Ouchie... eh he he.. I hit my head against the table when I heard you scream.
^Another girl, rises up from the floor.
^This time, is a short black haired bispectacled girl.
^With her hands on the back of her head, massaging it.
^Hehe.... don't look at me like that. It's not like I'm bleeding...
^That's true. But you'll never know. A concussion or something could be possible.
^The brown haired girl swings the tray and uses it to point at me.
^What do you think that is? A sword?
^Well, at least she doesn't look like she is gonna hit me with it anymore.
^This thing started screaming at me all of a sudden!
^You	Oi oi, both of you, you are hurting my feelings. I'm not this thing.
^Well, I'd be more worried that it didn't.
^Or that if it can only scream....
^Both girls suddenly fall into deep silence, and stared at me.
^You	Eh... W-what...? Something on my face.
^And the spectacle girl lets out a big sigh.
^Time to clean up this area then...
^Fixed? Is she some kind of doctor or something?
^Wait then why am I in a cafe?
^Ah ha. This must be one of those underground hospitals you see in movies or something right?
^Sherlyn, don't you think that it's behavior has been pretty weird?
^The girl, who is called Sherlyn, shoots a glance at me.
^See? How it just jerked like that.
^Probably it had a nightmare or something. What cha think, Xiao Mei?
^She puts her hand to her chin and looks down as if in deep thought.
^In the first place, AIs even dream at all?
^Ahh... the classic question: Do androids dream of electric sheep?
^You were the one who brought up the topic. Why are you asking me?
^Is that a question directed to me?
^The two girls stare at me, as if their very next decision depended on my answer.
^Are they going to dissect me if I answered wrongly?
^Is there a politically correct answer to this?
^In the first place, why are the two of them talking to me as if I wasn't a human?
^She utters while pinching the bridge of her nose.
^Cringing, as if I was saying something utterly absurd.
^You do know you are A Robot right?
^I mean I had people jokingly say that my work ethic is like a robot but...
^The looks on your eyes tell me that you aren't joking.
^Sherlyn	Yep, that's definitely not the previous personality.
^I said so. This AI is acting weirdly.
^What what!?!? I- I'm a robot? Since when?

Day_1_pt_1_2: ^So, in summary, the master of the Cafe is hospitalized after a car accident,
^you guys are in the red after paying all the hospitalization fees
^and here am I replacing him as a full time barista here at Hummingbird Cafe.
^That's right. And you will be working under me.
^She exclaims proudly, puffing her chest out.
^You	No wait! Why are you acting all so smug for? You guys are in the red!
^Sherlyn built you, and you have been working fine with us up till three days ago. Because of..  What was it... a crash?
^And thanks to that I have been sitting here for three days trying to fix you.
^But I managed to refrain myself from saying that last line out loud.
^She is. You'd be surprised by the things she make.
^Stop it, you are making me blush....
^Sherlyn closes the lid of the tool box.
^But the truth is, I didn't do much...
^I love and specialize in creating and fixing things, especially robots.
^Car engines, 3D printers, Vengeful knife welding Voomba that murders anyone who enters your house.
^Oi oi, why are you casually saying something something as dangerous as that?
^I don't know much about AI and how they work.
^The old man at the junkyard gave me your personality core when I asked if they had any cores.
^"Here, take this old junk" he said
^"No one buys ancient junk like this anyway. Not even the scrappers."
^"Just take it, it'd cost more to recycle it."
^Putting that aside, I didn't do much to fix you on the software side of things.
^I'd be surprised if you fixed yourself but...
^Through the lens of an amateur like me, it seems like someone or something was fixing you.
^You mean someone has been entering our cafe late at night?
^No, if that is so, the alarms would have tripped and at the very least we would have found the person in out CCTV records.

c-0: ^A malware attack would have been more likely. Maybe that's why you crashed in the first place.
^Sherlyn... you.... thank you... for following up my joke..
^I'll ask my friends for their opinions or something. For now I gotta go to school.
^To school? Aren't you working here too?
^She is but, her shift isn't on Tuesdays and also she had been working on you the past 3 days.
^So it wouldnt be fair if I asked her to stay.
c-1: ^Don't fall asleep in classes. Listen carefully to your lecturer, he must have been pretty smart to get a teaching role at a university.
^That sounds like something I should be saying to you.
^At least, that's the kind of student I'd imagine you to be if you were in my class.
^Oh yeah! Oh wait in that case....
^Why don't cha make a cup of coffee for Sherlyn?
^It's fine, Imma just sleep during the boring lectures.
^You can't do that that! That's problematic for me if the person who saved me were to flunk school because she was too busy fixing me.
^Come on. It's on me. What would you like?
^Honestly I don't know why are you acting all so hyped up. We are just doing a calibration check.
^You are so mean! Calibration check? I am honestly just trying to pour my heart out to you.
^Calibration checks are something that a barista do everyday for the sake of our customers.
^Anyway, while you are at it, could you do me a favor?
^The Analyze feature. I don't actually remember installing this feature inside, but I didn't want to brick you so I didn't uninstall it.
